SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Interface Scene

All Known Subinterfaces:
GUI_Scene
All Known Implementing Classes:
AreaScene, BoardScene, ChooseColorScene, ChooseObjectiveScene, ConnectionScene, EndgameScene, LocalPlayerAreaScene, NotificationScene, OpponentAreaScene, PrintBoardUI, PrintEndgameUI, PrintGameUI, PrintHelperUI, PrintNicknameSelectUI, PrintOpponentUI, PrintPlayerUI, SetPlayersScene, TUI_Scene
public interface Scene
This interface defines the skeleton of a displayable scene (abstracting from TUI/GUI).
Provides generic methods to display the scene or to show notifications and errors on the scene

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    display()
    Displays the scene on-screen.
    void
    displayError(String error)
    Displays an error message on this scene
    void
    displayNotification(List<String> backlog)
    Displays a notification on this scene

      Displays an error message on this scene

    • displayNotification
